name: High-cost drugs for erectile dysfunction
title: Spend on high-cost drugs for erectile dysfunction per 1000 patients
description: Spend of drugs for erectile dysfunction which are not low-cost generic PD5E-inhibitor tablets per 1000 patients
numerator_short: Spend on high-cost drugs for erectile dysfunction
y_label: Spend on high cost ED drugs per 1000 pts
why_it_matters: Phosphodiesterase-5 (PDE-5) inhibitors are the recommended as the first line treatment for erectile dysfunction.
Most of these are now generic and inexpensive, and these should ideally be considered before more expensive treatments.  Other treatments are also available, usually following specialist referral.
